goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 518 KB)
indicator_definition: Proportion of ever-partnered women and girls aged 15 years and older subjected to physical, sexual or psychological violence by a current or former intimate partner in the previous 12 months, by form of violence and by age
un_custodian_agency: United Nations Children’s Fund (UNICEF) The United Nations Entity for Gender Equality and the Empowerment of Women (UN Women) United Nations Population Fund (UNFPA) World Health Organization (WHO) United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC)
REC_USE_LIM: Refers to the women aged 15-59 years old.
